snippet: The move was the latest attempt by the Maduro government to end what it sees as meddling by the United States as tensions between the two countries increased.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro demands that United States reduce staff at its embassy to number similar to that of Venezuelan Embassy in Washington; says Americans entering country will now need visa and will have to pay fee equal to that paid by Venezuelans for US visa.
lead_paragraph: The move was the latest attempt by the Maduro government to end what it sees as meddling by the United States as tensions between the two countries increased.

headline.main: Venezuela Tells U.S. to Reduce Embassy Staff
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Tells U.S. to Reduce Embassy Staff
